name: Pastry Pop Match-3
description:
Pastry-themed Match 3 Puzzle Game.

Note: there is an issue with the audio stuttering, which seems to be common in Godot HTML5 exports, but has no fix as of now.

Asset Credits:
  • Logo images - https://persefida.itch.io/sweets-icon-pack
  • Pieces, obstacles, BG - https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-match-3-game-assets
  • UI - https://cga-creative-game-assets.itch.io/gold-2d-mobile-ui-for-casual-game
  • Font - https://opengameart.org/content/candy-coloured-clown-font
  • Music - https://opengameart.org/content/pleasant-creek
  • Sound Effects - https://www.zapsplat.com/
